ygData.subject: RE: Is this thing on?
ygData.msgSnippet: Selos is awesome. I am 39th with a Battledrum, and I always get tells saying WTF?!!!! I blow by any Bard and SoW rs may as well be sitting having a beer. I
ygData.messageBody:
Selos is awesome. I am 39th with a Battledrum, and I always get tells saying
WTF?!!!! I blow by any Bard and SoW'rs may as well be sitting having a beer.
I blow by so fast I even hear shouts sayin who the heck just ran past me? I
couldnt target them they were over the horizon too fast. I can carry 160lbs
at 90 str and outrun SoW easily. Oh yeah at 30th with the drum I raced a
Shaman using Cheetah, it was a tie. He wont race me anymore because he knows
I am skill based.

One bummer, GMs have a spell called SoN (spirit of Norrath) and the same
friend raced the GM, and the GM blew him away really badly. I guess
challenging that 50th Bard GM to a race is out.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 1:37 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Is this thing on?



Interesting findings John. I have gotten sporadic mailings fro the lst
today so it may not be functioning correctly. I wonder if the SOW curve is
linear? I have found that I sometimes pass by druids using SOW when just
singing Selo's, although very slowly, and I am only 16th level. I wonder if
they were encumbered or if some other variable was affecting things. Twice
they /tell'd me wanting to know how I passed them when they were using SOW,
but at the time I didn't think to ask them about encumbrance.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [ mailto:kim@... <mailto:kim@...> ]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 2:34 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Is this thing on?


From: John Kim <kim@...>

Testing testing. I've gotten no mail from this list today.
Update to the Accelerando run/walk speed chart. I think
around L30 is when Accelerando sung surpasses an equivalent
level SoW:

<pre>

Effect Speed Time Source

Running
Running 1.00 1.00 (baseline - no enhancements)
SoW 1.35 0.74 (L14 shaman)
Selo's 1.37 0.73 (L21, no drum)
Selo's 1.38 0.73 (L25, no drum)
SoW 1.39 0.72 (L20 druid)
SoW 1.40 0.71 (L26 shaman)
Selo's 1.43 0.70 (L30, no drum)
Selo's 1.64 0.61 (L21, with drum)
Selo's 1.70 0.59 (L25, with drum)
Selo's 1.71 0.58 (L26, with drum)
Selo's 1.83 0.55 (L26, with battle drum)
Selo's 1.89 0.53 (L30, with battle drum)

Effect Speed Time vs Run Source

Walking
Running 1.00 1.00 1.00 (baseline - no enhancements)
Walking 0.66 1.52 0.66 (walking, no enhancements)
SoW 1.02 0.98 0.75 (L14 shaman)
Selo's 1.06 0.94 0.75 (L26, no drum)
SoW 1.08 0.93 0.77 (L26 shaman)
Selo's 1.38 0.73 0.80 (L26, with drum)
Selo's 1.50 0.67 0.82 (L26, with battle drum)


Effect Speed Time vs Unenc Source

Encumbered
Running 1.00 1.00 1.00 (baseline - no enhancements)

Running 0.93 1.07 0.93 (10 over, 87/77)
SoW 1.30 0.77 0.96 (10 over, 87/77, L14 shaman)
Selo's 1.77 0.56 0.97 (10 over, 87/77, L26 bard, battle drum)

Running 0.87 1.15 0.87 (20 over, 97/77)
SoW 1.24 0.81 0.92 (20 over, 97/77, L14 shaman)
Selo's 1.71 0.58 0.94 (20 over, 97/77, L26 bard, battle drum)

Running 0.73 1.36 0.73 (40 over, 117/77)
SoW 1.10 0.91 0.82 (40 over, 117/77, L14 shaman)
Selo's 1.59 0.63 0.87 (40 over, 117/77, L26 bard, battle drum)

Running 0.48 2.10 0.48 (80 over, 157/77)
SoW 0.84 1.19 0.63 (80 over, 157/77, L14 shaman)
Selo's 1.33 0.75 0.73 (80 over, 157/77, L26 bard, battle drum)

</pre>

--
John H. Kim
